overview: During a wedding, we flash back to some of the sexual escapades between the people attending the ceremony. This film has it all - steamy group sex, threesomes, nasty interracial couplings, lesbian vignettes and anal escapades! Set amidst the free sex era of the '70's, this is one wedding to attend!
tagline: Opens A Pandora's Box of Carnal Delights
title: Ceremony...  The Ritual of Love
